name: The Assailant's Arrival
description:
Summary: A teenager falls from an alternate universe and attempts to survive in the present universe by looking 
for shelter in a forest during the winter. Attempt to figure out how to return to his world, but 
destiny had other plans, will our protagonist survive, will he receive assistance from others, and 
will he be able to return to his universe?

The player interacts with and battles with yeti animals as the protagonist struggles to survive after falling into the winter wilderness. After moving on to the following cut scene, The Assailants, the antagonistic gang, kidnap the protagonist. In the first episode, the protagonist makes it back to their hub. In order to defend himself and flee from their base, the player begins interacting with and engaging in combat with the enemy gang members. The protagonist will learn some information about him along that process.

Third Person Perspective Gameplay
Cut Scenes
Shooter Gameplay
Action-Adventure Gameplay
Interactive Gameplay
